mapper.select: SELECT a.sponsorPic,a.signCount,a.startTime,a.endTime,a.sponsorIntro, b.picUrl,b.id AS sponsorPicId,c.viewCount,d.voteCount,a.campaignName,a.campaignScroll FROM t_t_campaign a LEFT JOIN t_t_sponsor_pic b ON a.chainId = b.chainId LEFT JOIN t_t_campaign_view c ON a.chainId = c.chainId LEFT JOIN t_t_campaign_vote d ON a.chainId = d.chainId WHERE a.dataStatus = 1 AND a.chainId = #{chainId} ORDER BY b.created ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_t_user a WHERE a.dataStatus = 1 AND a.chainId = #{chainId}
a.name like CONCAT('%',#{queryKey},'%') OR a.number like CONCAT('%',#{queryKey},'%')

SELECT a.id AS userId,a.number,a.voteCount,a.viewCount,a.giftPoint,a.name,a.headPic,a.declaration, b.picUrl,b.id AS userPicId FROM t_t_user a LEFT JOIN t_t_user_pic b ON a.chainId = b.chainId AND a.id = b.userId WHERE a.dataStatus = 1 AND a.chainId = #{chainId} AND a.id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.created ASC
mapper.update: INSERT INTO t_t_voter (`openid`,`nickname`,`headimgurl`,`rawData`,`created`) VALUES (#{openid},#{nickname},#{headimgurl},#{rawData},now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `nickname` = #{nickname}, `headimgurl` = #{headimgurl}, `rawData` = #{rawData}, `updated` = now()
